commentary.revenue_performance: Consolidated revenue grew by 7.3% in INR terms. Ex-beverages, India business volume grew by 5%. International business saw strong CC growth of 23.6%.
commentary.profitability: Operating Profit grew 10% (Adjusted 16%). Gross margin expanded by ~300 bps due to material deflation. A&P investments increased by 43%.
commentary.business_outlook: Management maintains the 19.5% annual operating margin guidance despite legal costs. The onset of the festive season is expected to augur well for the business.
commentary.key_challenges: Beverage portfolio saw a 10% decline due to **uneven rainfall and deficient monsoon** in North India. Namaste LLC legal costs impacted profitability by Rs 63 crores in the first half.
commentary.strategic_initiatives: Home Care grew 15% (Odomos share 65% after 556 bps gain). Hair Oils share improved to 17% (143 bps gain). Rs 30 to Rs 40 crores capex allocated for aseptic PET bottle line for coconut water.
commentary.market_conditions: Rural consumption was impacted by deficient monsoon, but the uptrend is expected to continue. Deflationary trends in the commodity basket are anticipated to continue.
